Description.Text: This establishment is located in a unique setting, surrounded by nature and yet only minutes from the centre of the town of Almaden, Ciudad Real. It is located next to the City Park Almaden, 1 km from the town centre. Restaurants are to be found in the immediate proximity of the hotel, which is about 3.5 km from Almaden's bus station and around 12 km from the railway station.

The hotel offers spacious double rooms, all with outside views and exquisite, modern dÃ©cor. All accommodation units are air conditioned and feature twin or double beds (depending on room) with mattresses and viscoelastic pillows, as well as baby cots and an extra bed (on request). In addition to a private bathroom with hydromassage shower, hot towels and a hairdryer, further standard in-room amenities include a telephone (fee) and Internet access (free wireless), as well as a minibar (charge), plasma TV and individually regulated heating units.

Constructed in 2010, this 32-room city hotel offers a cafÃ©, which has a private terrace where guests can enjoy a cocktail at sunset. Parking is available for exclusive use by guests, free of charge. This is a hotel offering everything guests need to make their stays unforgettable. In addition to a lobby area with 24-hour reception and check-out services, a hotel safe, cloakroom and lift access to the upper floors, further facilities available to guests at this air-conditioned family-friendly accommodation include a bar, auditorium, restaurant, conference facilities and wired and wireless Internet access. Furthermore, guests can enjoy room service and there is a cellar for storing bicycles. Those arriving by car may leave their vehicles in the hotel car park.
